item.title: One
item.description: Foobar Foobar is a Python library for dealing with word pluralization. Installation Use the package manager pip to install foobar. pip install foobar Usage import foobar foobar.pluralize('word') # returns 'words' foobar.pluralize('goose') # returns 'geese' foobar.singularize('phenomena') # returns 'phenomenon' Contributing Pull requests are welcome. For major changes, please open an issue first to discuss what you would like to change. Please make sure to update tests as appropriate.
